statements: SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT id, temperature, soil_moisture FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, soil_moisture FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE temperature < 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING average_temp > 20;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(soil_moisture) AS avg_moisture FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT id, temperature, soil_moisture FROM SensorData WHERE soil_moisture < 50 AND temperature > 20 ORDER BY id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture WHERE moisture_level > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_readings ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_readings WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture FROM soil_moisture;
SELECT * FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) FROM temperature_readings GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(temperature) FROM temperature_readings WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) FROM temperature_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture WHERE moisture_level < 0.5 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location='Garden' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location='Farm' AND moisture_level < 30 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, location, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature >= 25;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureData WHERE location='Garden' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, last_updated, status FROM SensorStatus WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureData JOIN TemperatureData ON SoilMoistureData.sensor_id = TemperatureData.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture;
SELECT id, sensor_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM analysis ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor WHERE id = 2;
SELECT analysis_result FROM analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, sensor_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_moisture GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_moisture > 50;
SELECT sensor.sensor_name, analysis.analysis_result FROM sensor JOIN analysis ON sensor.id = analysis.sensor_id WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM temperature GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING total_readings > 10 ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, moisture_level FROM SoilMoisture WHERE moisture_level > 50
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, temperature FROM Temperature ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, last_update, status FROM SensorHealth
SELECT * FROM SoilMoisture ORDER BY timestamp DESC, moisture_level ASC
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM Temperature WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC, sensor_id ASC
SELECT sensor_id, latitude, longitude FROM SensorLocation WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC
SELECT sensor_id, status FROM SensorHealth WHERE status = 'OK' ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC, value ASC
